text:
Dr. Bridget, owner of @GreenHarvHealth, will be on That Stoner Show Friday January 24th at 10am. Hear how #MedicalCannabis & #CBD can help Reclaim Wellness! There will be a focus on #Cancer, recent #Cannabis research, but she will be answering submitted questions.

@ShowStoner https://t.co/n5avwq3Khb
